Drink driver Tere Moekore jailed for Auckland hit-and-run that killed Papatoetoe High School student Kaea Matau https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/drink-driver-tere-moekore-jailed-for-auckland-hit-and-run-that-killed-papatoetoe-high-school-student-kaea-马塔乌/HF5G3QXZLVGW7KJZFVHKRWIYRM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/drink-driver-tere-moekore-jailed-for-auckland-hit-and-run-that-killed-papatoetoe-high-school-student-kaea-马塔乌/HF5G3QXZLVGW7KJZFVHKRWIYRM/ Craig KapitanTere Moekore was four times over the limit when she hit Kaea Matau - and kept on driving. Fri, 01 Nov 2024 22:00:00 +0000 Kaea Matua, 14, was killed while crossing Great South Rd in Papatoetoe in March. He was hit by a car driven by Tere Moekore (inset), who was four times over the legal limit for alcohol on a learner's licence and travelling at 95km/h in a 50km/h zone. Photo / Alex Burton
